name: Roots Race
description:
This game was developed for the Global Game Jam 2023 by Edgar Quex

In this skill and racing multiplayer game, each player controls a root in a competition. The player must use his skill to dodge obstacles and collect nutrients while traveling the longest distance. Each nutrient collected increases the speed for a moment, making it easier to overcome obstacles and go so far. 

The root that travels the longest distance in a time limit wins. 

Know Bugs

  1. Sometimes the multiplayer server saturates and does not load the game.  You must update and try again.
  2. The connection is peer to peer so that the first player to enter a room (player 1) becomes the host.  If he moves from one window to another, the game is paused for everyone
